H0.text: Tar is the product made from silica sand, a resource used in large volume in Nevada.

H1.text: Glass is the product made from silica sand, a resource used in large volume in Nevada.

H2.text: Plastic is the product that is made from silica sand, a resource used in large volumes in Nevada.

H3.text: Electricity is the product made from silica sand, a resource used in large volume in Nevada.

A4.text: Trinitite is a glassy residue formed from the desert floor sand at the Trinity nuclear bomb test site.

A5.text: Obsidian is a common volcanic glass with high silica (SiO2) content formed when felsic lava extruded from a volcano cools rapidly.
